StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
• 12+ years of strong experience in Software Development on various technologies & tools with deep knowledge of SDLC, Waterfall & Agile(Scrum) having good debugging, requirement analysis, team management, client handling and problem solving skills. • Functional domain experience includes Telecom/H&PS/BFS/Infrastructure Management applications. • Strong skills include Core Java, Data Structures, Algorithms, Design Patterns, Databases & quick learner. • Have 11 years of strong experience of interacting with the clients, requirements, data & application analysis & designing the approaches/solutions. • 5+ years of strong experience in leading the team to successfully delivering the projects, strongly appreciated by the clients & managers.
CAREER ASPIRATION
To work in a technically competitive environment on challenging assignments that shall yield the dual benefit of the job satisfaction and a steady-paced professional/financial growth.
TECHNICAL SUMMARY

PositionHistory.Title: Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Team Leader, Architect
1) Fetching the Requirements 2) Analysing, discussion with client & finalizing the requirements 3) Created HLD, LLD & Unit test plans 4) Create, update & review the Blue Martini Rules & Java files 5) Monitor, manage & keep the database updated with correct data 6) Keep all the project documents & metrics sheets updated 7) Participate in SQA of the team & DPA 8) Provide the project status & team members progress to manager & group head
Blue Martini IDE, IBM RAD7.0, IBM Websphere, Toad, Blue Martini, Core Java, Junit, Oracle9i, CVS, Data Structures, Design Patterns
Telecom

PositionHistory.Title: Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Team Leader, Architect
1) Understand the requirements & design the Java classes 2) Provide the estimation for development & testing tasks 3) Design the application test automation framework 4) Design the database & its tables & class structure 5) Develop Java files required to create the framework, review & code quality check 7) Create the tables, triggers & procedures & functions in database 8) Write various Java utility files to fetch the data from database, excel & XML files, generate various kind of reports and write code to send automated alerts, notification/information mails.

[Sovren:226;] We found no work history positions within the past year. A resume should include work history information, including time off, for the most recent year.
